import React from 'react' import {Button, Container, Jumbotron, ProgressBar} from 'react-bootstrap' class BattleMenu extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ powerReady: false } } render(){ let{powerReady}=this.state let{currentPlayer, player1, player2, powerUps}=this.props return(

Player 1

  • Score:
  • Boats Left {player1.boatsleft}
  • Hits:
  • Power-up meter

Player 2

  • Score:
  • Boats Left {player2.boatsleft}
  • Hits:
  • Power-up meter
) } } export default BattleMenu
